Improved Heroic Strike.name: Improved Heroic Strike
descriptions: Increases the critical strike chance of your Heroic Strike ability by 2%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Heroic Strike ability by 4%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Heroic Strike ability by 6%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Heroic Strike ability by 8%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Heroic Strike ability by 10%.

Tactical Mastery.name: Tactical Mastery
descriptions: You retain up to 15 of your rage points when you change stances.
You retain up to 25 of your rage points when you change stances.
You retain up to 35 of your rage points when you change stances.

Deflection.name: Deflection
descriptions: Increases your Parry chance by 2%.
Increases your Parry chance by 4%.

Improved Charge.name: Improved Charge
descriptions: Increases the amount of rage generated by your Charge by 5.
Increases the amount of rage generated by your Charge by 10.
Increases the amount of rage generated by your Charge by 15.

Duelist.name: Duelist
descriptions: Increases the critical strike chance of your Overpower and Revenge abilities by 25% and reduces the cooldown of your Retaliation ability by 25%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Overpower and Revenge abilities by 50% and reduces the cooldown of your Retaliation ability by 50%.

Improved Thunder Clap.name: Improved Thunder Clap
descriptions: Increase the Slow effect and damage of your Thunder Clap ability by 50%.
Increase the Slow effect and damage of your Thunder Clap ability by 100%.
Increase the Slow effect and damage of your Thunder Clap ability by 150%.

Improved Hamstring.name: Improved Hamstring
descriptions: Increases the duration of your Hamstring by 2 secs.
Increases the duration of your Hamstring by 4 secs.
Increases the duration of your Hamstring by 6 secs.

Anger Management.name: Anger Management
descriptions: Increases the time required for your rage to decay while out of combat by 30%.

Impale.name: Impale
descriptions: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your abilities in Battle, Defensive, and Berserker stance by 10%.
Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your abilities in Battle, Defensive, and Berserker stance by 20%.

Deep Wounds.name: Deep Wounds
descriptions: Your critical strikes cause the opponent to bleed, dealing 10% of your melee weapons' average damage over 12 seconds. Stacks up to 5 times.
Your critical strikes cause the opponent to bleed, dealing 20% of your melee weapons' average damage over 12 seconds. Stacks up to 5 times.
Your critical strikes cause the opponent to bleed, dealing 30% of your melee weapons' average damage over 12 seconds. Stacks up to 5 times.

Poleaxe Specialization.name: Poleaxe Specialization
descriptions: Increases your chance to get a critical strike with Axes and Polearms by 1%.
Increases your chance to get a critical strike with Axes and Polearms by 2%.
Increases your chance to get a critical strike with Axes and Polearms by 3%.
Increases your chance to get a critical strike with Axes and Polearms by 4%.
Increases your chance to get a critical strike with Axes and Polearms by 5%.

Mace Specialization.name: Mace Specialization
descriptions: Causes your attacks with maces to ignore up to 120(scales with your level) of your target's Armor.
Causes your attacks with maces to ignore up to 240(scales with your level) of your target's Armor.
Causes your attacks with maces to ignore up to 360(scales with your level) of your target's Armor.
Causes your attacks with maces to ignore up to 480(scales with your level) of your target's Armor.
Causes your attacks with maces to ignore up to 600(scales with your level) of your target's Armor.

Sword Specialization.name: Sword Specialization
descriptions: Gives you a 1% chance to get an extra attack on the same target after dealing damage with your Sword.
Gives you a 2% chance to get an extra attack on the same target after dealing damage with your Sword.
Gives you a 3% chance to get an extra attack on the same target after dealing damage with your Sword.
Gives you a 4% chance to get an extra attack on the same target after dealing damage with your Sword.
Gives you a 5% chance to get an extra attack on the same target after dealing damage with your Sword.

Sweeping Strikes.name: Sweeping Strikes
descriptions: Your attacks strike an additional nearby opponent. Lasts 20 seconds.

Two-Handed Weapon Specialization.name: Two-Handed Weapon Specialization
descriptions: Increases the damage you deal with two-handed melee weapons by 2% and increases the damage of your Bleed effects by 5%.
Increases the damage you deal with two-handed melee weapons by 4% and increases the damage of your Bleed effects by 10%.
Increases the damage you deal with two-handed melee weapons by 6% and increases the damage of your Bleed effects by 15%.
Increases the damage you deal with two-handed melee weapons by 8% and increases the damage of your Bleed effects by 20%.
Increases the damage you deal with two-handed melee weapons by 10% and increases the damage of your Bleed effects by 25%.

Maim.name: Maim
descriptions: Your auto attacks have a 10% chance to injure the target, increasing physical damage taken by 5% for 10 seconds.
Your auto attacks have a 10% chance to injure the target, increasing physical damage taken by 5% for 20 seconds.
Your auto attacks have a 10% chance to injure the target, increasing physical damage taken by 5% for 30 seconds.

Para Bellum.name: Para Bellum
descriptions: Reduces the cooldown of your abilities by 4%.
Reduces the cooldown of your abilities by 8%.
Reduces the cooldown of your abilities by 12%.
Reduces the cooldown of your abilities by 16%.
Reduces the cooldown of your abilities by 20%.

Dog of War.name: Dog of War
descriptions: Reduces the cost of your abilities by 4%.
Reduces the cost of your abilities by 8%.
Reduces the cost of your abilities by 12%.
Reduces the cost of your abilities by 16%.
Reduces the cost of your abilities by 20%.

Mortal Strike.name: Mortal Strike
descriptions: A vicious strike that deals weapon damage plus 100 and wounds the target, reducing the effectiveness of any healing by 50% for 10 seconds.

Improved Mortal Strike.name: Improved Mortal Strike
descriptions: Reduces the cooldown of your Mortal Strike ability by 0.5 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of your Mortal Strike ability by 1 sec.
